title: bharatha thai
sahitya:
bhAratat tAy tanda selvanE (engaL) bhArati enum sArva bhowmanE engaL (bhArata)

anupallavi

dhIramuDan bhArata maindar viLangiDa vIra uNarvadanai vidaitta vittaganE (bhArata)pArOr pugazhndiDum pAvalanE (inda) pAril bhArata annai uyarvadanai sIriya sentamizhk kavi tanilE 
pEruvagai koLa seyvadilE 

madyama kAlam

unakku nigar nI enRa nilai tanai 
inikkum tamizh isaiyil tanda mudalvanE (bhArata)
